ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Fwd: RE: [EQ-Bards] Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Conveniently, I post an FAQ rather regularly that answers all these questions.  I ll send it directly to you. Talies the Moderator
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:43 AM 5/25/2001 -0700, you wrote:
>When we get duel weild will we be able to play an
>instrument and use a weapon at the same time? Has
>anyone maxed out their hand to hand before
>getting duel weild? And when does song weaving
>come into effect or is it something that just
>gradually comes into being as we level? And
>lastly, what would you say our very most
>important stats are in order? Thanks in advance
>for any help! =)


Conveniently, I post an FAQ rather regularly that answers all these
questions. I'll send it directly to you.

Talies the Moderator
